document.full_text: medtronic inc's resolute drug-coated stent met the main safety goals of a large study of u.s. patients, providing the final data the company expects to need to seek u.s. approval of its next generation heart device.
document.title: new medtronic stent safe, effective in u.s. trial
lines_and_colors: medtronic inc's resolute drug-coated stent met the main safety goals of a large study of u.s. patients, providing the final data the company expects to need to seek u.s. approval of its next generation heart device.
